attributes.action: Vote for the Queen to form government
attributes.background: Vote for the Queen to form government  due to the incompetence of the Conservative government and also the other side of the house the Labour Party over the withdrawal of United Kingdom from the EU

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about Brexit and Parliament, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like to happen. For example, we're not sure whether you'd like a referendum on a specific change to the powers of the Monarch or something else. 

You can find out more about the Monarch's powers here: 

https://www.parliament.uk/education/about-your-parliament/mps-lords-monarch/the-monarch-and-parliament/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could also sign one of these petitions instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237424
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
